column4: The only reference I can find for that is on softpedia http://linux.softpedia.com/get/Utilities/xboxdrv-37436.shtml  I couldn't see anything in the ubuntu repo's or ppa's
of course i've compiled it myself, but it would be a lot nicer with a package and startup scripts;-)
looks like a few queries about it on ubuntuforums as well, but not much, doesn't seem that helpful i'm afraid
